# 1903 Swarthmore Quakers football team

The 1903 Swarthmore Quakers football team was an American football team that represented Swarthmore College as an independent during the 1903 college football season. The team compiled a 6â€“4 record and outscored opponents by a total of 99 to 67. George H. Brooke was the head coach.
